original_title: ‘Get ready for the IPL – watch your favourite teams battle it out LIVE on Dialog Television and on the Dialog ViU App’
original_body_lines: The Indian Premier League (IPL) is all set to return with its 16th season in 2023, much to the excitement of cricket fans across the world. The defending champions, Gujarat Titans, will be eager to retain their title, but with several strong teams vying for the coveted trophy, the competition promises to be intense. Catch all the action LIVE on Dialog Television Star Sports 1 (Ch. No. 68) and Star Sports 1 HD (Ch. No. 120) and on the Dialog ViU App, and stay up-to-date with all the latest action. The IPL runs from 31st March to 28th May, and is one of the most anticipated sporting events of the year.

You can easily activate either channel with a few taps on the MyDialog App or by sending a simple SMS – Just text “On <space> Dialog Television connection Number <space> Channel Number (68 or 120)” to 0770 679 679, and you’re all set. Enjoy Star Sports 1 for just Rs. 5+tax per day or Rs. 124+tax per month, and Star Sports 1 HD for just Rs. 7.50+tax per day or Rs. 124+tax per month!
No need to worry about missing a game as you can watch any match as many times as you like within 72 hours of its airing on Dialog ViU Hub.

With the Dialog ViU app, you also have the convenience of being able to watch the tournament anytime, anywhere. You just have to activate the ViU Sports Pack via https://go.viu.lk/Sports for just Rs.6.25+tax per day or Rs. 165+tax per month, and enjoy all the action with zero data charges. If you are a Dialog Television customer and have already subscribed to Star Sports 1 or Star Sports 1 HD on your Dialog Television, then you can enjoy the tournament on the Dialog ViU app for free, with zero data charges.
So, catch the thrills of the IPL 2023 , LIVE on Dialog Television and on the Dialog ViU App!
